tagline: UCSD undergraduate, quick learner, midnight coder, anime-lover, and maybe your future intern.

experience.name: CircleUp
content: Full-stack development using the Django framework and Angular.js
Implemented a "community" newsfeed section interfacing with several API's such as Prismic.io and Disqus
Introduced responsive web design to key flows, increasing mobile conversion rates
Strengthened site security via anti-XSS measures, cookie protection, unit tests, and integration tests

experience.name: Perspectium
content: Developed an endpoint-based MySQL table management API in Java
Co-managed a SCRUM board to promote agile software development lifecycle

experience.name: BlueChip Machine and Fabrication
content: Collaborated with a partner to prototype and machine a custom aluminum project
Designed products in SolidWorks and Adobe Illustrator, machined on a CNC mill with MasterCam

experience.name: SPAWAR
content: Independently populated a marine particle size survey which provided useful biological heuristics
Followed military lab protocol in collecting data and analyzing it in Microsoft Excel

projects.name: Programming Competitions
content: Placed 3rd/100+ in Winter 2014 Microsoft Coding Challenge (6 problems total, 1.5 hours)
Placed 8th/74 in Fall 2013 Women in Computing Beginner’s Programming Competition (14 problems total, 2.5 hours)

projects.name: HTML/JS Resume
content: Created a JSON-based resume by leveraging AJAX techniques and a JS templating engine (you're looking at it!)
Implemented responsive web design to ensure mobile and print compatibility (check this out on your phone!)

projects.name: DesuSync
content: Created an Node.js/Angular.js webapp that updates Hummingbird.me anime lists via AJAX calls to the API
Utilized the HTML5 File API to allow easy drag-and-drop updating of anime lists from local files
Implemented redundancy checking and update queues to minimize the number of queries made

projects.name: FIRST Robotics Team 1538
content: Led the prototyping, design, machining, and assembly of the team’s consistently top-seeded robot
Coached team members in soft & technical skills via engineering projects and one-on-one training
Networked with industry heads, organizations, and sponsors to expand and maintain team relationships
